title: Return of the NFL QB Stock Game! Plus, Playing Hockey for the Mob With Brad Wingfield.
description:
Russillo brings back the QB Stock Game, in which he assigns share values to NFL starting QBs before Ceruti, Kyle, and Ryen create their portfolios for the season (0:36). Then Ryen talks with former pro hockey player Brad Wingfield about his time playing for the Danbury Trashers, a UHL hockey team owned by Jimmy Galante, an associate of the Genovese crime family; you can learn more by watching the Netflix documentary ‘Untold: Crime and Penalties’ (19:36). Finally, Ryen answers some listener-submitted Life Advice questions (45:35).


Host: Ryen Russillo
Guest: Brad Wingfield
Producer: Kyle Crichton and Steve Ceruti
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
